name: Chapel Hill Community Park
description: Large neighborhood park with a toddler-friendly playground and shaded paths. Great for open play, short walks, and easy picnics.

name: Southern Community Park
description: Expansive park with fields and a modern playground that’s great for toddlers. Plenty of shade and room to run around.

name: Chapel Hill Public Library
description: Bright, kid-focused library with a dedicated children’s area and free storytimes. There’s also an outdoor playground for extra wiggles.

name: Kidzu Children’s Museum
description: Hands-on exhibits that encourage STEM exploration and pretend play for toddlers. A perfect indoor choice for curious little ones.

name: Homestead Aquatic Center Splash
description: Seasonal splash and water play ideal for hot days. Shallow features make it friendly for toddlers.

name: Coker Arboretum Walk
description: A peaceful, stroller-friendly loop among trees and gardens. Easy terrain with plenty to explore and smell.
